member.name: AgileReferenceOptions.AGILEREFERENCE_DEFAULT
member.summary: Use the default marshaling behavior, which is to marshal interfaces when an agile reference to the interface is obtained.

member.name: AgileReferenceOptions.AGILEREFERENCE_DELAYEDMARSHAL
member.summary: Marshaling happens on demand. Use this option only in situations where it's very likely that an object is resolved only from the same apartment in which it was registered.
